p: Kampo drugs, maoto, kakkonto, jinkokato, senkyuchachosan, and bakumondoto ( Table 1), were purchased from Tsumura & Co. (Tokyo, Japan). Constituents of the Kampo drugs, crude drugs, and the ratios of crude drugs included in Kampo drugs are posted at the web site of Tsumura & Co. (summarized in Table 2). Crude drugs, Glycyrrhizae radix, Atractylodis lanceae rhizome, Rehmanniae radix, Citri unshiu pericarpium, Cnidii rhizome, and Saposhnikoviae radix ( Table 2), were also purchased from Tsumura & Co.
